game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a terrible curse that causes the crops to wither and die. The villagers believe it's the work of a mischievous bandit lord who has stolen the magical acorn that once brought fertility to their lands.
game.objective: Retrieve the magical acorn from the clutches of the bandit lord, Gorvoth, and return it to the village elder.

reward.item: Amulet of Oakwood (+5% chance to hit)

tasks.description: Speak with Gorvoth's informant, a shady character named Ralthor, who was last seen at the local tavern.
Infiltrate Gorvoth's hideout and steal the magical acorn without getting caught.
tasks.location: Gorvoth's Hideout (Old Windmill on the outskirts of Oakwood)

tasks.description: Return the magical acorn to Village Elder Thorne and claim your reward.

game.title: The Missing Acorn of Oakwood
